description: Modify clump attributes. This is a synonym for the clump attribute command. See clump attribute for complete list of available keywords, modifiers, and detailed documentation.
notes: This command is a synonym for clump attribute
Refer to clump attribute command for complete documentation
All keywords, modifiers, and behaviors are identical to clump attribute

examples.description: Set density for clumps in group (same as clump attribute)
Set velocity for all clumps (same as clump attribute)
Reset displacement (same as clump attribute with multiply modifier)
Set angular velocity for clumps 1-100 (same as clump attribute)

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Same as clump attribute: use Clump.set_*() methods (e.g., Clump.set_density(), Clump.set_vel(), Clump.set_pos()) - requires iteration over clump range
